name: BunnyHopHop
description:
Controls:

Left arrow key to move to the left

Right arrow key to move to the right

Use Mouse Left Click to navigate through the game menu

*Note: The game  will auto restart whenever the game ends

Tips:

1.Try to survive for as long as you can while collecting as much points as possible. 

2.Avoid touching the BOMB as it will result in an immediate game over.

3.Collect the Carrots to grant the rabbit 1 super jump during it's next jump.
